mapper.insert: insert into rabbit_info (rabbitNo, cageNo, birthParity, initialWeight, coatGloss, rabbitHouseNo, identicalRabbits, economiType, sex, initialAge, fineHairType, origin, mainCoatColor, paternalNo, coatFeature, maternalNo, roughType, age, coatColor, bornDate, nipplesNumber, photo) values (#{rabbitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthParity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{initialWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coatGloss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rabbitHouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identicalRabbits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{economiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initialAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fineHairType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCoatColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paternalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coatFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maternalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roughType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coatColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bornDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nipplesNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rabbitNo, cageNo, birthParity, initialWeight, coatGloss, rabbitHouseNo, identicalRabbits, economiType, sex, initialAge, fineHairType, origin, mainCoatColor, paternalNo, coatFeature, maternalNo, roughType, age, coatColor, bornDate, nipplesNumber, photo from rabbit_info
